title: What is the difference between textile and apparel technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Textile Technology comprises of manufacturing of fabric either from fiber or filament and/or directly from fibre(non woven) and it's technique. Non fashionable but more textile techno concerned. Apparel Technology comprises only of manufacturing of garments and it's techniques. However, every technique from fibre will describe but briefly. Fashionable technology.

Hello It's lot of difference Textile technology will give knowledge and can be learn each field of textiles like weaving , designing, spinning, testing and management Whereas apparel technology, gives knowledge about only apparel and little about fashion design, which tells how fabric transform to apparel
